roleset.name: watch what you eat, (restricting one's) food intake, regulating or modifying eating behavior

role.descr: distinguishing characteristic of the diet (ultimately indicates food consumed or avoided)

example.name: diet-v: diet on
example.text: Opinion On The Man Who Dieted On McDonalds Food .

example.name: diet-n
example.text: Both Drs . Meade and Grokest prescribed medications for him to take , and instructed him to watch his diet ( to lower his cholesterol ) ,

example.name: do_diet-l: light verb, both args
example.text: So I 'm prepping myself to do a green diet soon .

example.name: do_diet-l: Light Verb
example.text: This is how to do a diet that has minimal exercise .

roleset.note: DIET-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from diet.01-v)
DIET-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on WN eventive noun lexicon (4th sense). No VNcls. (from diet.01-n)
If it starts to seem too much like it's referring to food itself, rather than the act of eating in a certain way, call it .YY. (from diet.01-n)
